CallObjectDetails.description: Structure describies given call object from your system. Used to retrive data for both ended and active calls.

accountId.description: Identifier of the object representing the company associated with the call.

whoId.description: Identifier of the object representing the individual associated with the call.

whatId.description: The identifier of the object representing the Ticket (case) associated with the call. This should be something that can be done.

id.description: System identifier for the connection provided.
